channel.title: Changing Picture endings (.npp to .gif)
channel.description: Before you go asking what .npp is, it's the extension this Art Program I have uses and it is really annoying because I'm trying to make menu's with hyperlinks and all that but it won't show on my Website, no Image/File hoster anywhere supports .npp so... I was wondering if there is a way I can change it to an extension so that I CAN upload it. All help appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Changing Picture endings (.npp to .gif)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

when you go to “save as” does it give you other file extension options?
It should. And if not, then I really don’t have any idea for you. Other than taking a screenshot of it and pasting it into MS Paint

Read full topic

item.description:
